title: Wow seeing Vayne vs. Kalysta in every single ranked game is great fun!
body: Amazing patch by Riot! It's so refreshing to have League turn back to utter garbage after we had such great balance for a month!

replies.body:
Actually the top 3 most picked champions in the game goes {{champion:67}} ,{{champion:412}} , and {{champion:222}} in that order.
Kalista ranks 42 on OP.gg, And 29 on Champion.gg
It does suck that my two most hated champions in the game are 2nd and 3rd. :L
When I'm first pick I just ban those three. I know chances are I just banned someone's main.  And that feels good.

And asshurt Thresh/Jinx mains are downvoting the two of us.
Their salt sustains me.
I hate you. I read, "Their salt sustains me" in Mordekaiser's voice without even realizing it...
Same here D:
13/10 upvotes respectively, take your persecution complex elsewhere pls
Sorry, initially one dude downvoted both of us, hence the comment.

> [{quoted}](name=OperationDEEZ1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-27T23:59:37.131+0000)
>
> And asshurt Thresh/Jinx mains are downvoting the two of us.
> Their salt sustains me.

you do realize your the salty one complaining about champions and circlejerking with others who share the opinion, right?
Gotta ban {{champion:64}} too. Doesn't even matter if he's strong, he has so many mains and none of them know how to play anything else.

Better buff Lee Sin's extremely high damage ultimate.

But then lets give Kassadin 10 more damage on his ult so he still does more damage with his auto attacks.

Honestly, the ult buff is going to be near useless.
The passive buff though, now that's big.
The fact Lee Sin is even buffed is pathetic, while they simultaneously buff Kassadin to make his ultimate still do less damage than his base attack damage until late game.

Eh, it gives a low elo a slightly better early jungle while high elo really isn't going to give a rip.  It sounds more like a placebo buff to get him more play in higher elo.

Kass, well... I get the feeling he's going to be bad until he gets the Sion treatment.  His ultimate really is a sink or swim ability.

> [{quoted}](name=Kuroi86,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=0001000000020001000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-28T20:03:59.369+0000)
>
> Eh, it gives a low elo a slightly better early jungle while high elo really isn't going to give a rip.  It sounds more like a placebo buff to get him more play in higher elo.
> 
> Kass, well... I get the feeling he's going to be bad until he gets the Sion treatment.  His ultimate really is a sink or swim ability.

Lee sin is literally god in low elo, and mid elo too. The pros all agree he's balanced, and he shits on people below pro, so why is he being buffed?

I just don't get how Riot decides who to buff. There are champions who are much worse off than Lee.

I usually go down the win rates and find champs with like 5+ play percent.  You could probably run calculations on the raw stats to determine your chances of losing a game to various champs based on their play rate, ban rate, role percent, and win rate.  You'd need to know what your team wants to play though, to really get anywhere, otherwise, you can really only make assumptions on your role.
There was a great thread about sleeper picks and an excel sheet identifying them. What you're describing is probably that + bans.

And then you get to fight against the 65% win rate skarner :')
A+++++ Job balancing before worlds, Rito. Don't worry, they nerfed Janna.
{{champion:64}}  is also picked very often

Wow seeing Vayne ~~vs. Kalysta~~ in every single ranked game is great fun! 

Fixed it.

Ban Phase:  okay they first banned Elise. that's alrright.

"welp gotta ban Skarner because he's OP right now"

Okay they banned Rengar; guess i can't blame them

"Morde can't go through, when he's on my team he's useless, but on their team he goes 23/0."

They banned Riven. Yay, no flaming Riven mains.

"And I'm going to ban Fizz because I hate playing against Fizz top." 

Pick Phase: {{champion:429}} 

"...fuck..."
or {{champion:102}}  or {{champion:114}}  or {{champion:105}}  or

{{champion:60}} is good to counter both {{champion:102}} and {{champion:114}} , but people are to scare of her and then get punish by then. When I ban with my teamate, we choose generally those we have problem to manage.
LOL every time I play fiora and I see an elise I destroy her.
Bring back Cinderhulk and delete Devourer.

Yeah, I loved the 3 hour games with Sejuani, Cho'Gath, and Gragas all going full tank! Teamfights were so entertaining when it was the equivalant of 10 people slapping each other with wet pool noodles!
It's better than everyone blowing up in half a second with no counterplay.
Strategy game vs Arcade mode.

{{champion:86}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:157}}  are the two most popular champs for each role.  ADC, support, and jungle diversity are crap.  Middle is the most diverse lane, followed by top.

> [{quoted}](name=hgjkdlsaf jeldvb,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-28T00:59:25.437+0000)
>
> {{champion:86}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:157}}  are the two most popular champs for each role.  ADC, support, and jungle diversity are crap.  Middle is the most diverse lane, followed by top.

Well Lee is kinda meh and has a huge player base.

lee sin is not meh.  Now all i have to do is get a dumb tank to chase me, Q him kick him into the enemy team as they take the extra damage q in and e hydra. Wham entire enemy team is at 45% health. And the w out.

> [{quoted}](name=KFC Cashier,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-08-28T01:56:25.041+0000)
>
> lee sin is not meh.  Now all i have to do is get a dumb tank to chase me, Q him kick him into the enemy team as they take the extra damage q in and e hydra. Wham entire enemy team is at 45% health. And the w out.

Play Lee then, Freelo OP scum. He is not riven/skarner/garen/vayne. They dont need you getting use to their kits to do well (Yes even riven, pick her up, she has a lot of potential, but her skill floor is also really low)

Every champion's skill floor is low. It's the skill ceiling that matters in a MOBA (at the stage where people know what they're doing, as opposed to new players). 

Say what you will about even Azir, his basics aren't that hard to grasp. League does a great job at working with keeping the burden of knowledge low.

> [{quoted}](name=Anidan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-28T04:50:10.904+0000)
>
> Every champion's skill floor is low. It's the skill ceiling that matters in a MOBA (at the stage where people know what they're doing, as opposed to new players). 
> 
> Say what you will about even Azir, his basics aren't that hard to grasp. League does a great job at working with keeping the burden of knowledge low.

What are you talking about dude. Shaco's skill floor is not low. Syndra, Cass also come to mind.

> [{quoted}](name=Tails Doll,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=000700000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-28T20:24:46.660+0000)
>
> What are you talking about dude. Shaco's skill floor is not low. Syndra, Cass also come to mind.

Azir.  TF.

> [{quoted}](name=Mike17032,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-29T03:50:02.783+0000)
>
> Azir.  TF.

Lmao yeah, TF , though simple, requires a fairly high skill floor to do decent due to micro magnament.
Lol you forgot another jungler XD

I guess that Lee is so popular that he's both of the two most popular junglers.


Maybe once with a pure tank build, and the other with a more damage/bruiser build?
maybe 3 defense items,2 damage items and  a mercury's treads? is that a good buils?

Janna is only good because she counters high engage supports.

Guess which are the highest supports currently? Thresh, Leona, Nautilus.

She dies to poke/sustain supports.

Guess which ones are the most gutted supports? Sona, Soraka, Lulu.

As a Lulu main i can say lulu is not gutted I pick her every chance i get unless my need teams the disengage from Janna or the Spell shield from morgana. Also Raka is being played a decent amount in challenger/Master at least from the games ive seen recently

knowing that its 5 seasons in and annie is still left untouched gives me hope for the future! how to win mid vs annie:.....................................             
Thanks for the great job on the skillset you put on this champ :)

I don't know about that.
Even my Kog mid (which has a really crappy early game) can win against Annie, or at the very least not die.

> [{quoted}](name=SinisterRaven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-27T23:46:43.095+0000)

>
> knowing that its 5 seasons in and annie is still left untouched gives me hope for the future! how to win mid vs annie:.....................................             
> Thanks for the great job on the skillset you put on this champ :)

What the hell?She's not the most op mid laner here ,her simple kit make it easy to understand how to play against her.
hello?
Kalista kinda falls off lategame. Ever since this patch I have stopped banning her in my games. {{champion:67}} & {{champion:18}} however...
{{champion:222}} is a sitting duck if you have a champion that can reach her {{champion:238}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:245}} etc....

> [{quoted}](name=CoolKnightST,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WMMvQ33u,comment-id=001a0000,timestamp=2015-08-28T20:10:50.160+0000)
>
> {{champion:222}} is a sitting duck if you have a champion that can reach her {{champion:238}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:245}} etc....

And Vayne get's deleted by champs like Yi, Fizz, or anyone else that can one button jump to her and global her.

Stop picking 3 tanks and wondering why the tank buster wrecks you.
Damn, it sucks that we don't have anyway to ban these champions in our games...oh wait.
